title: EthSential
description: EthSential is a security analysis framework for Ethereum smart contracts. It bundles security analysis tools (Mythril, Securify and Slither) to find vulnerabilities in smart contracts code.

title: The Twenties
description: A desktop application based on the 20-20-20 rule that will help you to schedule the time spent looking at a screen and help you to reduce eye-strain.
